long_description:
# VoxeLibre Get Comfortable

Adds commands to /lay or /sit to VoxeLibre (ex. MineClone2) or Mineclonia, as well as the ability to sit on some blocks (stairs and slabs out-of-the-box) by right-clicking them.

![Screenshot](https://content.luanti.org/uploads/d80f36718f.png)

Port of the good old [cozy mod](https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?f=11&t=14143) (originally made for MTG by everamzah) to work with VL/MCLA properly and even provide some nice new features!
